speaker: KING HENRY IV
text_entry: So shaken as we are, so wan with care,

speaker: KING HENRY IV
text_entry: Find we a time for frighted peace to pant,

speaker: LADY MACBETH
text_entry: perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: measure him, says she, by my own spirit; for I

speaker: Second Lord
text_entry: Takes from Aufidius a great part of blame.
